description:
When the forecast is uncertain, bring along some warmth insurance. The packable jacket has a streamlined fit to slide under a shell or ride solo when you don't need protection from rain or snowflakes. The external fabric has mechanical stretch so it won't feel constricting or ride up as you move.

  • Made of recycled polyester with easy mechanical stretch
  • lavalan® wool insulation uses an 80/20 blend of Swedish wool and corn-based polyester, creating a natural, renewable, and washable insulation
  • PFC-free DWR finish shrugs off unexpected showers and keeps your jacket cleaner longer
  • Lined in smooth recycled polyester
  • 2-way front zipper
  • Close fitting hood with a one-hand adjustment in back
  • 2 zippered chest pocket and 2 zippered handwarmer pockets
  • Adjustable hem and elastic binding at the cuffs help seal out the cold
name: Fjallraven Keb Wool Jacket - Women's
